name: Paper Monsters 2 (Canceled)
blurb: Paper Monsters 2 is a classic 3D platformer that is the follow up to the critically acclaimed Paper Monsters.

rewards.reward: Thanks for playing along - In addition to our heartfelt thanks for backing our project, you\u2019ll also get the game before your friends - including the Kickstarter exclusive content - and we'll even throw in 500 buttons to help you build your in-game wardrobe (buttons can be exchanged for items in the game). You'll also receive a wallpaper pack for all devices and a mobile version of the app.

The gift of paper - We\u2019ll send you a PDF containing a limited edition Paper Monsters 2 papercraft. Print and assemble your very own collectable paper toy in the comfort of your home. As an extra thanks, you\u2019ll also get fame and glory (your name will be listed on the website),  the digital soundtrack, ringtones and the mobile app.

Very important paper person - You'll be first and last to play the game with the pre-release and final versions for PC/Mac.  You'll also receive the mobile version as well as 500 buttons. Plus, credit where credit is due - you'll see your name in the game credits as a Kickstarter backer.

Paper bundle - You\u2019ll receive the PDF for all three collectable papercraft toys. You can print and assemble a main character, a rocket ship, and a paper foe.  You'll be first and last to play the game with the pre-release and final versions for PC/Mac.  You'll also receive the mobile version as well as 500 buttons and a download of the soundtrack.

The BETAs - A bundle of rewards awaits you, including the PDF for all three collectable papercrafts, 500 in-game buttons, PC / MAC pre-release and final versions of the game, mobile app version, the digital soundtrack and ringtones, and your name in the credits. You'll also get a Kickstarter exclusive Paper Monsters 2 t-shirt (NOT available in the store) and, most importantly, power. Your input helps create the game as a Beta-tester!

Something solid - You might need to clear up some space on your desk. This pledge earns you a 3-D ceramic printed character, as well as all three printable papercrafts. You\u2019ll also get the digital soundtrack, not to mention a swell of pride when you see your name in the credits. Plus, you\u2019ll be first to get your hands on the PC/MAC game, mobile app and provide input as a Beta tester.

Something really solid - Here\u2019s an even sturdier way for us to thank you. You\u2019ll receive a stainless steel 3-D printed main character as well as all three printable papercrafts and a digital soundtrack download. Plus, the ego boost of seeing your name in the app credits. You\u2019ll also be first to get your hands on the PC/MAC game, mobile app and provide input as a Beta tester.

What\u2019s in a name -- If you\u2019re not into material things, here\u2019s your chance to make your mark on the game itself. We\u2019re offering 3 pledges the chance to name a boss. Pick a name, any name. (Or rather, pick a name, any name that is not already an existing copyright.) We\u2019ll also throw in a soundtrack download, Kickstarter exclusive T-shirt, your choice of a ceramic or stainless steel 3-D character, all 3 papercrafts, and first dibs on playing the game on PC/MAC and Mobile and be a Beta tester.

Get in the game -- For a more visual presence in the game, this pledge allows you to create one in-game item. Maybe you\u2019d like to design a snappy outfit for your character? Here\u2019s your chance to become a cardboard fashion icon. You can even create your own logo apparel, if you please. Of course you'll also get a digital soundtrack download, Kickstarter exclusive T-shirt, all 3 papercrafts, your choice of a ceramic or stainless steel 3-D character, and invite to be a Beta tester.

Part of the team - Do you dream in 3-D? Work directly with the game\u2019s design team to create [ something larger ] Of course you'll also receive the digital soundtrack download, Kickstarter exclusive T-shirt, all 3 papercrafts, your choice of a ceramic or stainless steel 3-D character, and an invite to be a Beta tester.

Dare to be bad -- We all have a dark side. Maybe your dark side has a vision for a badass paper villain. You\u2019ll get to work with our designers to create your very own bad guy. Additionally you'll receive a download of soundtrack, Kickstarter exclusive T-shirt, all 3 papercrafts, your choice of a ceramic or stainless steel 3-D character, and an invite to be a Beta tester.

Live on in the game -- Here\u2019s your chance to immortalize yourself in paper. Work with the designers to create your own original character for the game. It\u2019s your chance to be creative, or narcissistic if you just want to make a paper version of yourself. And you'll receive all the paper bells and whistles including a download of soundtrack, Kickstarter exclusive T-shirt, all 3 papercrafts, your choice of a ceramic or stainless steel 3-D character, and an invite to be a Beta tester.
